dmca.title: "Agrandar el pene" Site Complains to Google (#2)
dmca.body:
September 26, 2003

Google, Inc.
  [Private]

Mountain View, CA 94043
  [Private]


Formal Notification of Copyright infringement under DMCA

Currently, Google is providing links and ads to a web pages which are infringing my copyright.

The web site infringing my copyrighted work is: http://www.zonauno.com

The material (html code, texts and graphics) infringing my copyrighted work is accessible through Google with the following way:

Google AdWords with the keywords:

agrandar el pene
agrandar pene
alargar el pene
alargar pene

Campaign URL: httpm//www.zonauno.com

Google Search with the keywords:

site:www.zonauno.com +"zonauna"
agrandar el pene
agrande su pene
agranda tu pene

Infringing Web Pages:

http://www.zonauno.com/ 
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/index.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/comofunciona.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/beneficios.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/alternativas.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/resultados.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/preguntas.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/empezar.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/ayudageneral.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/espanol/miembros.htm

http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/index.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/howitworks.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/benefits.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/ripoffs.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/thefacts.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/faqs.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/started.htm
http://www.zonauno.com/manual/english/members.htm

This web site owner has copied my web site layout, html code, graphics and texts located at http://www.peneana.com. According, his actions are in violation of United States copyright law and I request Google either remove or disable access to the web sites above detailed.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner (me), its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Since you have now been put on notice, you do now have actual knowledge that the material on your system is infringing. Failure to act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material strips you of the protections for OSPs provided by the DMCA.

I am not seeking to become involved in litigation, but I will take all necessary measures to protect my intellectual property rights. I presume that you would agree that we can resolve this amicably.

Sincerly yours,

  [Private]

Peneana.com 
http://www.peneana.com

Email.   [Private]


Phone:   [Private]
  [Private]
  [Private]
Buenos Aires - Argentina
